pr_title: [#1791] Allow hashed passwords credentials with a whitelist of algorithms

timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: I would use a HashSet, rather than an array.
timeline.author: ctron

replies.bodyText:
An array is populated without extra work by springboot from a YAML list, or with comma separated values in an environment variable :)
That said, the setter method could convert the array to a HashSet.
replies.author: jbtrystram
